verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be bold! *Be bold!
Be strong! *Be strong!
For the Lord Thy God is with thee. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am not afraid, *I am not afraid.
I am not dismayed, *I am not dismayed.
I'm walking in faith and victory.
Come on, let's walk in faith and victory.
For the Lord Thy God is with thee.
